name: Shabby Dive - Post Jam Version
description:
Shabby Dive - Post Jam Version

CONTENT WARNING: ALCOHOL CONSUMPTION

Are you a true gunslinger? Or maybe you can't hit a bull’s rump with a handful of banjos.

Take down 3 opponents quicker than half a second and the hop juice is on me.

Seeing double? That means points are doubled.

Ah, and don't shoot the fellas with white flags.

Now pull your six-gun out.

Credits Author

Jakub Niemyjski

Music

Old West Gunslingers (By Steve Oxen)
from www.fesliyanstudios.com
